answers.answer: Sounds like nerve involvement.  Did you recently injure your foot?  wear tight fitting shoes?  Is there a mass that is in the vicinity of the pain that could be pressing on the nerve and causing numbness?I would recommend getting a nerve conduction test and EMG to rule out nerve damage.  I would also recommend getting a blood test to rule out diabetes.  Neuropathy (nerve pain) can be caused by diabetes.

question: the out side of my left foot has gone numb also my small toe
title: foot sore
